Hard-NTR, not for me. Shame too, I really wanted to fav something from this series to keep an eye on the author going forward, but all of the chapters just have something missing, or go too hard on the NTR tropes like this one. Like, it’s not even the literal concept of “stealing” that turns me off NTR. I don’t like it -obviously- but I can tolerate it. It’s hard-NTRs seemingly required focus on emotional suffering of some dude that turns me off; I don’t “feel bad” for the dude, I just get turned off when the focus of my porn is on a random dude crying. Hats off to those who can ignore that, I mean it, y’all have some top tier artists churning out doujins for ya. Glad to see the toxic shitbags like the dude below me still skulking about. The people who whine and complain about NTR are just as annoying as the ones who unironically use the word “zoomer” as an insult. And before anyone conflates me with the former, I explicitly attempt to have actual discussion, not shout and scream.
